source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_00<tab>Y'shtola has the look of a woman satisfied with her work.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_00<tab>哲学者の広場前のヤ・シュトラは、やる気に満ちている。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_01<tab>Not long after you and your comrades notify the Forum of your mission's success, Y'shtola receives a linkpearl call from Nidhana, who informs her that a great feast will be held in Radz-at-Han to celebrate Azdaja's homecoming. The members of your party are naturally invited, but before you can make your way to Thavnair, you must deliver the memoria crystal containing Zeromus's aether to your friends in the First.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_01<tab>ヤ・シュトラから、ラザハンで宴が催されると聞いた。先にゼロから託されたメモリアを第一世界に届けるため、クリスタリウムのドッサル大門にいる「衛兵団の守衛」と話し、星見の間へと向かおう。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_02<tab>Upon arriving in the Crystarium, you present yourself to the sentry at the Dossal Gate. The man directs you to the Ocular while he goes to find Lyna and Beq Lugg.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_02<tab>作戦が無事に終わったことを、星見の間にいるベーク＝ラグたちに報告しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_03<tab>While they were already well aware of your triumph, your friends are no less happy to hear your personal account, having been glad to play a role in protecting the Source. They are further delighted and intrigued when you entrust to them the memoria crystal and explain Zero's idea of using it to restore balance to the First. While there is no telling if it will be possible, Beq Lugg and Ryne resolve to do their utmost to try.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_03<tab>ベーク＝ラグにメモリアとソウル・サイフォンを託し、ふたつの世界で光と闇を交換する計画について伝えた。星見の間の「ライナ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_04<tab>Lyna had faith that you would be victorious in the end, and she is equally certain that the people of Norvrandt will cheer when they learn the Warrior of Darkness managed to save <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> home. She assures you that they will continue the work they've begun, and so secure in the knowledge that the fortunes of the First will surely improve, you return to the Source that you may join the celebration in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_04<tab>ほかの地域の人々への報告は、ライナが代わりに行ってくれるようだ。ラザハンのメーガドゥータ宮前にいる「物腰柔らかな官吏」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_05<tab>You arrive in time to partake of a sumptuous feast at Mehryde's Meyhane. Having had your fill, you step aside for a moment's respite and find Estinien doing likewise. The dragoon takes the opportunity to inquire as to your future plans, and when you struggle to answer, he assures you that you will know when the time is right. The two of you are then joined by Y'shtola, who muses that her coming days will be spent compiling theories on cross-rift travel. But when she turns to ask after Estinien's plans, you find that he has already silently taken his leave─as is his wont.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_05<tab>エスティニアンの旅立ちを見送った。ラザハンのメリードズメイハネにいる「ヤ・シュトラ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_06<tab>Y'shtola thanks you for everything you've learned and accomplished─to have been a part of something so momentous─before taking her leave. Alone once more, you heed her suggestion and make your way to Meghaduta, there to call on Vrtra.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_06<tab>ヤ・シュトラもまた、シャーレアンに戻っていった。ヴリトラに挨拶するため、「メーガドゥータ宮」に向かおう。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_07<tab>You find Vrtra in the form of Varshahn, who explains that he has assumed the guise to readily escort his sister Azdaja about Radz-at-Han. Long has he dreamed of showing her his beautiful city, a glittering jewel born of unity, and he intends to relish every moment of it. The happiness in his words warms your heart, and fills your breast with pride for the part you played in reuniting siblings separated across worlds and millennia. And though Darkness yet reigns in the void, the spark of hope has been rekindled, instilling you with faith that, one day, life-giving Light will shine there once more.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SEQ_07<tab>ヴリトラは、アジュダヤにラザハンの人々のことを知ってもらうため、ヴァルシャンの身体で、ともに街をまわるつもりのようだ。数千年の時を経て、隔たれた想いはこうして繋がった。きっとこれからも、ラザハンの民は竜の良き友であり続けるだろう。そしてヴォイドにも、いつの日か希望の光が輝かんことを。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Crystarium gatekeep at the Dossal Gate.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_00<tab>ドッサル大門にいる衛兵団の守衛と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Crystarium gatekeep at the Dossal Gate.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_01<tab>ドッサル大門にいる衛兵団の守衛と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Lyna.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_02<tab>ライナと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the accommodating official at Meghaduta.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_03<tab>メーガドゥータ宮前の
物腰柔らかな官吏と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_04<tab>ヤ・シュトラと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_05<tab>Head for Meghaduta.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_TODO_05<tab>メーガドゥータ宮に向かう

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ESTINIEN_000_001<tab>If I didn't know better, I'd say father dearest is warming to us. I've no interest in sipping tea at the family estate again, though. Drinks at the tavern, on the other hand...
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ESTINIEN_000_001<tab>親父殿も、ずいぶん話がわかるようになったじゃないか。
ルヴェユール邸で茶をしばくのはもう御免だが、
酒を酌み交わすというのなら、一度くらいは悪くない。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_URIANGER_000_005<tab>Although Master Louisoix hath left us, he liveth on in his teachings. 'Tis gratifying to see that Master Fourchenault, too, hath come to acknowledge the wisdom in them.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_URIANGER_000_005<tab>我が師ルイゾワの教えは、今も生き続けております。
この知が役に立つのであれば、どこにでも馳せ参じましょう……。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>I look forward to telling my father of our efforts in Garlemald. He will have sage counsel to offer, I'm sure.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>お父様には、後でガレマルドの件も報告しなければね。
きっと、何か良い助言をくださるだろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>You're of course welcome at our home─Mother, for one, would be thrilled to have you─but I won't twist your arm if you have other matters to attend to.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>お母様も歓迎してくれると思うし、
あなたをうちに招待したいところだけど……
ほかにも寄るのなら、無理に引き留めちゃ悪いわよね。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ATHELEYS_000_018<tab>If I heard correctly, it seems you've saved the world yet again!
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ATHELEYS_000_018<tab>またひとつ、世界の危機を救われたようですね！

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>With that, our obligations here are concluded.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>それじゃ、シャーレアンでの報告は以上ね。
次に向かうべきは……

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_021<tab>Oh, Nidhana. What news from Thavnair?
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_021<tab>あら、ニッダーナ。
何かあったの？

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_022<tab>They've returned, then? Wonderful. Rest assured all is well with us too.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_022<tab>そう、ヴリトラとアジュダヤがラザハンに帰還したのね。
私たちも皆無事よ。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_023<tab>...Is that so?
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_023<tab>……それは素敵な話だこと。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_024<tab>We would be honored, of course. I shall relay this to the others.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_024<tab>ありがたくお受けするわ。
皆にも、私から伝えておくわね。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_025<tab>A great feast will be held in Radz-at-Han to celebrate Azdaja's homecoming. We have all been invited.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_025<tab>太守姉弟の帰還を祝って、ラザハンの皆が祝宴を催すそうよ。
もしよかったら、皆も来て……と言っていたわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ALPHINAUD_000_026<tab>I'm afraid my sister and I must decline. We have only just returned home; to leave again so soon would be inconsiderate to our parents.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ALPHINAUD_000_026<tab>先ほど、お父様とも約束してしまったからね。
私たちふたりは遠慮するよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_URIANGER_000_027<tab>With regret, I too must excuse myself from attendance. A prior commitment requireth that I remain in Sharlayan for a time.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_URIANGER_000_027<tab>私も、シャーレアンに戻ったらすぐに連絡を寄越すようにと、
ある人物から言われておりまして……。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_URIANGER_000_028<tab>Let not our absence deter you, however. Pray enjoy yourselves to the fullest.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_URIANGER_000_028<tab>ですから、皆さんで楽しまれるとよいかと……。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ESTINIEN_000_029<tab>I've no plans in particular, so you can count me in. I may as well visit the Radiant Host while I'm there.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ESTINIEN_000_029<tab>俺は特に予定もないし構わん。
星戦士団の連中には世話になったしな、
挨拶も兼ねて顔を出しておこう。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_030<tab>How about you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_030<tab>あなたはどうかしら？

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_A1_000_001<tab>Far be it from me to turn down free food!
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_A1_000_001<tab>喜んでお受けしよう

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_A1_000_002<tab>I have a delivery to make to the First.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_A1_000_002<tab>先に第一世界に行かなければ……

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_032<tab>That's the spirit.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_032<tab>そう、それは良かったわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_033<tab>Ah, but what about the memoria crystal? 'Twould be remiss of us not to deliver it promptly to our friends in the First.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_033<tab>……ああ、でもあなた、
ゼロからメモリアを託されていたわね。
先に第一世界に行ってからの方が良いのではなくて？

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_034<tab>Ah, of course. The memoria crystal. 'Twould be remiss of us not to deliver it promptly to our friends.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_034<tab>……そうだったわね。
ゼロから託されたメモリアを、かの世界に届けなくては。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_100_034<tab>Also, if they are to transfer Light and Dark between worlds, they will need command over the Crystal Tower.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_100_034<tab>第一世界とヴォイドで光と闇のやりとりをするのなら、
クリスタルタワーを動かすことになる、か。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_035<tab>In which case, I shall give you my spirit vessel to take again. When you arrive in the Crystarium, the sentry at the tower should be able to round up everyone for you.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_035<tab>それじゃ、空のソウル・サイフォンも渡しておくから、
報告がてら、星見の間まで届けてもらえるかしら？
「衛兵団の守衛」にでも頼めば、皆を集めてくれるはずよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_036<tab>Once you have seen to matters there, come and join us at Meghaduta.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_036<tab>それが終わって、こちらに戻ってきたら、
メーガドゥータ宮に向かって頂戴。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ALISAIE_000_037<tab>Give everyone our regards, you hear?
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_ALISAIE_000_037<tab>それじゃあ、第一世界のみんなによろしくね！

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_000_100<tab>Welcome back, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Mistress Ryne is still in the Ocular. Will you be joining her?
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_000_100<tab>ようこそお越しくださいました。
リーン殿がまだ中にいらっしゃいますが、
あなたも「星見の間」に向かわれますか？

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>Enter the Ocular?
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>「星見の間」へ移動しますか？

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_000_102<tab>Very good. If you would care to head inside, I shall send for Captain Lyna and Beq Lugg at once.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_CRYSTALGATEKEEPER_000_102<tab>では、こちらへどうぞ。
ベーク＝ラグ殿とライナ隊長も、すぐに呼んでまいりましょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_CRYSTARIUMGATEKEEP_000_100<tab>
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_CRYSTARIUMGATEKEEP_000_100<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_CRYSTARIUMGATEKEEP_000_102<tab>
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_CRYSTARIUMGATEKEEP_000_102<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_BEQLUGG_000_105<tab>For so long I was loath to trust in others, fearful of my research being misused again. That it may serve noble ends comes as a relief. I shall spare no effort to restore balance between Light and Dark!
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_BEQLUGG_000_105<tab>己の研究を悪用され、人が信じられなくなることもあった。
だが今は、知の探究を続けてきてよかったと心から思う。
光と闇の調和、実現してみせようぞ！

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_RYNE_000_110<tab>A brighter tomorrow awaits. Zero's Light will shine the way.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_RYNE_000_110<tab>ゼロさんの身体に宿った光が、
ヴォイドの明日を照らしますように……！

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_RYNE_000_115<tab>Hmm... If I had Gaia's help, I wonder if I could take in Darkness the same way Zero took in Light...
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_RYNE_000_115<tab>私もガイアと協力すれば、
ゼロさんが光を宿したように闇を制御できるでしょうか？
光と闇を交換するときに備えて、修行しておこうかな……。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_000_200<tab>It was a mighty struggle, but I had faith that you would be victorious in the end.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_000_200<tab>ご報告、ありがとうございました。
今回の準備に協力してくださった方々には、
私から作戦の成功をお伝えしておきましょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_000_201<tab>And I doubt not that the people of Norvrandt will cheer when they learn that the Warrior of Darkness managed to save <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> home.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_000_201<tab>カサードさんや、アム・アレーンの皆さん。
それから、光を集めることを受け容れてくれた、
ユールモアやラケティカ大森林の方々にも……。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_000_202<tab>
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_000_202<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_000_203<tab>I know you are a busy <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, so don't let us keep you. Rest assured that we will continue the work we've begun.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_000_203<tab>あなたは、きっとまた誰かに帰りを待たれているのでしょう？
どうぞそちらに行ってあげてください。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_000_205<tab>If the Crystal Tower is to be used for research, it may be prudent to bolster its security.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_000_205<tab>クリスタルタワーを研究で用いるとなると、
警備体制も見直さなければなりませんね。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_100_205<tab>It is the Exarch's legacy, and we must spare no effort to keep it safe.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_LYNA_100_205<tab>無論、衛兵団は協力を惜しみません。
……この塔は、偉大な「公」が残してくれた希望ですから！

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_MEGHADUTAEMPLOYEE_000_300<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, you honor us with your presence!
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_MEGHADUTAEMPLOYEE_000_300<tab>これは、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>様。
お待ちしておりました。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_MEGHADUTAEMPLOYEE_000_301<tab>Though I am but a humble servant, I offer you my heartfelt thanks for rescuing the satrap's beloved sister.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_MEGHADUTAEMPLOYEE_000_301<tab>太守様の姉君の御帰還、慶賀の至りに存じます。
つきましては、ラザハンの民が心よりお祝い申し上げるため、
宴を催すことと相成りまして……。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_MEGHADUTAEMPLOYEE_000_302<tab>But without further ado, the great feast to celebrate this joyous occasion is about to begin! The venue is Mehryde's Meyhane, and you are a guest of honor!
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_MEGHADUTAEMPLOYEE_000_302<tab>会場は宮殿ではなく、メリードズメイハネとなります。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>様も、そちらへどうぞ！

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_400<tab>'Twas a lively feast, was it not? And it impressed upon me once again how dear Vrtra is to his people.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_400<tab>ラザハンらしい、にぎやかな宴だったわね。
竜が人の国を治めていたなんて、最初は驚いたものだけれど、
あの愛されようなら、末永く安泰ね。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_401<tab>Well, as much as I should like to linger, 'tis past time I took my leave. If you mean to depart as well, I suggest you call on Vrtra before setting out.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_401<tab>名残惜しいけれど、私もそろそろ行かなくては。
あなたも出発するのだったら、
メーガドゥータ宮にいるヴリトラに一声かけていくといいわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_402<tab>And before I forget─thank you. For everything we learned, and for everything we accomplished, I couldn't be more grateful.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_402<tab>今回の旅は、私にとっても本当に得難いものとなった……。
誘ってくれたあなたには、改めてお礼を言わせて頂戴。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_403<tab>Till next time, take care.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_YSHTOLA_000_403<tab>では、またね。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_AZDAJA_000_405<tab>Vrtra's friend... I thank thee.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_AZDAJA_000_405<tab>ヴリトラの、トモ。
……アリガトウ。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SYSTEM_000_410<tab>Azdaja regards you with keen interest.
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_SYSTEM_000_410<tab>アジュダヤは、興味深そうにこちらを眺めている。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_500<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I hope you enjoyed the festivities. To be able to celebrate Azdaja's return with everyone was...moving beyond words.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_500<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
宴は楽しんでもらえただろうか。
皆でアジュダヤの帰還を祝ってくれて、本当に嬉しいかぎりだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_501<tab>Lest you wonder, I've chosen to use this vessel for now, the better to escort my sister about Radz-at-Han.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_501<tab>ああ、この姿か？
まだ小さいアジュダヤと行動するには、
少年の身体の方が都合がよさそうだったのでな。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_502<tab>This leaves my true form without an eye, but I do not anticipate having need of it in the immediate future.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_502<tab>しばらくは、本体が動くほどのこともないだろうと思い、
残る竜の眼を移したのだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_503<tab>Long have I dreamed of showing Azdaja my beautiful city, a glittering jewel born of unity. And I shall relish every moment of it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_503<tab>姉さんには、
この「多彩なる都」を余すところなく見てほしいんだ。
私と多くの人々が、共に築いてきた大切な場所を……。

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_504<tab>
target: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_504<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_505<tab>Now then, I believe both Y'shtola and Estinien have embarked on their respective journeys, but have you yourself business elsewhere?
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_505<tab>さて、ヤ・シュトラとエスティニアンは旅立ったのだな。
冒険者である君も、またどこかへ？

source: TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_506<tab>If not, you are welcome to remain here as long as you like. Should aught of import arise, we will inform you─but until such a day arrives, I bid you take your ease.
target:
TEXT_AKTKML107_04750_VARSHAHN_000_506<tab>もし望むなら、このままラザハンに逗留してくれて構わない。
なにかあれば報せるゆえ、
しばらくはのんびりと、冒険の疲れを癒やしてくれ。
